text:
The source file might start off with

<lenya:meta>
<dc:title>Lenya Features explained</dc:title>
...
</lenya:meta>

then as saves go on

<lenya:meta>


<dc:title>Lenya Features explained</dc:title>
...
</lenya:meta>

and again
<lenya:meta>






<dc:title>Lenya Features explained</dc:title>
...
</lenya:meta>

I think the number of blank lines seem to relate to the number of dc entries
written out
creator: ps@nomensa.com
